welcome.password.subtitle.l1: Almost done! But you have to set a password to keep your access token(s) safe.
welcome.password.subtitle.l2: Remember your password or your saved account will not be able to log in!
welcome.password.subtitle.l3: This password is saved in plain text before you create the account.
welcome.password.pwd.different: The password and repeat password are different
welcome.finish.text: That's all! You finished all the out-of-box settings!
account.microsoft.desc: Account purchased on the official website
account.offline.desc: Account that can only access single player and offline multiplayer
home.title: Home
home.chooseVer: Click here to choose a version
server.title: Server

mods.title: Mods
settings.title: Settings
settings.game.path.no: Select the folder where you want to storage game files
settings.recovery.reset.desc: Delete your all data and restart the app
settings.alert.reset.title: Are you sure to reset all data?
settings.alert.reset.content: Reset all data will remove all storages including saved accounts, and then the app will be restarted. Are you sure to continue?
settings.reload: You need to restart the app to apply these update
